chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini is experiencing the following issue:

The Face ID has been working for 2 months and no longer works. It's impossible to reconfigure it. The camera gets stuck at this level, doesn't pass to the next step; portrait quality changes from clear to blurry. The camera must be faulty.

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

I would like to remind you that the repair period will soon end.

I invite you to provide us with a follow-up link and details of the repair.

Without any news from you in the next 24 hours, we will refund the customer.

Regards,
Tiana-Rijamalala from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stocks available for an exchange. Instead we have fully refunded the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
